channel.title: 508 Espeon Summoning Saving?
channel.description: So yeah, I know this is really simple... but I can't remember how to do it on an espeon source lol, and i haven't worked on anything for over a year... it's just that the summoning skill isn't saving on logout.. and I dont see anything useful tbh in filemanager
